snippet: Paul Lawrie shot a five-under 67 and took a one-shot lead over Nicolas Colsaerts after the second round of the Qatar Masters.
lead_paragraph: Paul Lawrie shot a five-under 67 and took a one-shot lead over Nicolas Colsaerts after the second round of the Qatar Masters.

headline.main: Lawrie Takes Lead in Shortened Tournament
headline.print_headline: Lawrie Takes Lead in Shortened Tournament
